episodes.title: I Was in a Cult | A Deep Dive | Ex-member and Current Mental Health Counselor Shares Her Story
episodes.description:
I was in a cult. Now I'm a mental health counselor. This is a deep dive on the cult I was a part of, abuse allegations, and survivors' experiences. This cult's leaders now live in Hamilton, Alabama working alongside The Ramp. 

All claims are alleged and have not been proven in court. However, there are hundreds of examples from multiple members that back up these claims.

We must put an end to religious abuse, and taking advantage of teens and children who are vulnerable. We need to put a stop to the "troubled teen" industry.

To learn more about allegations about The Ramp:
Youtube: @GodComplexshow 
Tiktok:
@joeytrieb @thestephenwomack @jennysjourney0 
@iamnotrosieo @epistemiccrisis
Facebook: Stephen Womack

episodes.title: Cult Talk, Reacting To My Ex Cult Leaders Doing an Interview
Cult Stories, The Ramp, and My Cult
episodes.description:
MY #cultstory 

My #cult leaders didn't get me help when I was a teen, and told me I had a demon when I needed mental health care and intervention. 

This is NOT uncommon for ministries , especially radical ministries like #theramp in #hamiltonalabama and #karonwheaton ministries, who my cult leaders IDOLIZED. 

My cult leaders now live in #hamilton trying to rub elbows with her, and they attend #theramp 

#RSM

episodes.title: Comments On My Ex Cult Leaders Talking About How Much They Love The Ramp and Karon Wheaton
episodes.description: My ex cult leaders talking about how they wanted to be like The Ramp. They then went on to abuse me and many others with their "ministry."
